File 1
AxesOff
GridOff
ViewWindow 1,127,0,1,63,0
RclPict 1
Do
LpWhile Getkey<>0
Do
LpWhile Getkey<>31
ClrGraph
RclPict 2
Do
LpWhile Getkey<>0
Do
LpWhile Getkey<>31
ClrGraph
RclPict 3
Locate 6,2,"Press F1..."
While 1
Do
LpWhile Getkey<>0
Do
LpWhile Getkey=0
Getkey->K
If K=79
Then Prog "-SN1"
Break
IfEnd
WhileEnd
AxesOn
GridOn
